mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_apartment WHERE apt_loc LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
SELECT a.apt_name, a.apt_loc, b.apt_size, b.apt_img, b.apt_realprice FROM tb_apartment a JOIN tb_apartment_info b ON a.apt_code = b.apt_code WHERE a.apt_name=#{apt_name}
select a.apt_name, b.user_id, b.review_content FROM tb_apartment a JOIN tb_apt_review b ON a.apt_code = b.apt_code WHERE a.apt_name=#{apt_name}
SELECT a.apt_name, b.apt_realprice, a.apt_loc FROM tb_apartment a JOIN tb_apartment_info b ON a.apt_code = b.apt_code WHERE a.apt_loc LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
select a.APT_NAME , b.APT_REALPRICE , a.APT_LOC from TB_APARTMENT a,TB_APARTMENT_INFO b where a.APT_CODE = b.APT_CODE
SELECT a.apt_name, b.apt_realprice, a.apt_loc FROM tb_apartment a, tb_apartment_info b WHERE a.apt_code = b.apt_code AND b.apt_realprice < #{total}
SELECT a.apt_name, a.apt_loc, b.apt_realprice FROM tb_apartment a JOIN tb_apartment_info b ON a.apt_code = b.apt_code WHERE b.apt_realprice < #{total_money}
